item.title: [PI] Safe Zone Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

ok so im trying to code The hills in the wilderness the little box of it to be a small safe area.

but when I coded it the hills box was the wildy and the wildy was safe . heres my code can someone help me ? D:

public boolean inWild() {
if((absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366) && absX >= 3294 && absX <= 3298 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3651) {
return true;

  }
  return false;

}

Read full topic
